name: add
shortDescription: Adds support for an external library to your project.
longDescription:
Adds the npm package for a published library to your workspace, and configures
the project in the current working directory to use that library, as specified by the library's schematic.
For example, adding `@angular/pwa` configures your project for PWA support:

```bash
ng add @angular/pwa
```

options.name: defaults
options.description: Disable interactive input prompts for options with a default.

options.name: dry-run
options.description: Run through and reports activity without writing out results.

options.name: help
options.description: Shows a help message for this command in the console.

options.name: skip-confirmation
options.description: Skip asking a confirmation prompt before installing and executing the package. Ensure package name is correct prior to using this option.

options.name: verbose
options.description: Display additional details about internal operations during execution.
